ValidationRule.description: Start Date on Amendment Quote should not greater than End Date of Original Contract-BIZ-46104
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( ISPICKVAL(SBQQ__Type__c, 'Amendment'), ISCHANGED(SBQQ__StartDate__c ), NOT( ISNULL( SBQQ__StartDate__c ) ), (SBQQ__StartDate__c > SBQQ__MasterContract__r.SBQQ__ExpirationDate__c ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please enter Start Date less than the Subscription End Date
